name: 9GAG Dark | aperopia
additional_info:
Version:
  • v 5.0 - (16 February 2016) - color updates and fixes
  • v 4.1 - (27 August 2015) - color updates and optimizations
  • v 4.0 - (26 August 2015) - color updates
  • v 3.1 - (25 March 2015) - color updates
  • v 3.0 - (06 October 2014) - color updates - special loading function
  • v 2.0 - (27 September 2014) - color updates
  • v 1.0 - (12 September 2014) - first release

to remove the Wake Up! message go: here

more themes: userstyles, wikipedia, tumblr
css: @-moz-document domain("9gag.com") {*{border-radius:0!important}body{color:#fff!important}body,section,div.CS3,section.badge-block-ad.block-ad div.badge-gag-ads-container.img-container,div.in-post-top,div.in-post-top span,div.naughty-box,div.btn-container,div.blank-state,div.badge-page section#upload-file div.btn-container,div.width-limit div.badge-gag-ads-container.image-container,form#forgot-password div.btn-container,form#login-email div.btn-container,form#signup-email div.btn-container,div.col-comments,section#settings div.btn-container,div.notice-message,div.static-block,div#overlay-bg,a.cmnt-btn.link.grey.size-30.submit-reaction{background:#090909!important}div.btn-container,div.title,ul li.selected p,div.comment-pagination.badge-load-more-container div.btn-container a,ul li.selected,.badge-sticky-nav,ul.search-suggestion li.ui-menu-item a:hover{background:#565656!important}a.btn.grey{background:#565656!important;color:#b4b4b4!important}input[name=login_name],input[name=email],select[name=lang],select[name=safeMode],input[name=new_password],input[name=new_password_repeat],input[name=fullName],select[name=gender],input[name=dob_year],input[name=dob_month],input[name=dob_day],select[name=country],textarea[name=blogTitle],input#signup-email-name,input#signup-email-password,input[name=username],input#login-email-password,input#jsid-interaction-name,input#jsid-interaction-email,select#jsid-email-category,input#jsid-email-subject,textarea#jsid-email-message,input#recaptcha_response_field,textarea.post-text-area.badge-post-textarea,input.badge-email-subscription-input{background-color:#1e1e1e!important;color:#b4b4b4!important;border-color:#606060}section.modal.upload .field.textbox input[type="url"]{background-color:#1e1e1e!important;color:#b4b4b4!important;border-color:#606060!important}form#listview-search input#search-hero{background-color:#1e1e1e!important;color:#b4b4b4!important;border-color:#606060!important}section.modal.upload .field{border-color:#606060!important}div.blank-state.search h3{color:#8c8c8c!important}.setting-social-connect .connection{background-color:#1e1e1e;border:1px solid #606060}.setting-social-connect .connection p.label{color:#dcdcdc!important}a.btn:hover,input[type="submit"]:hover{color:#fff!important}div.btn-container{background-color:#1e1e1e!important;border:1px solid #606060}input#search-hero,div.section-header h3,div.info h3,div.static-block p,tbody,thead,ul.form-nav a,a.btn.badge-add-fb-timeline,a.btn,div.main-wrap a.btn,div.content.badge-content,section#sidebar a.btn,a.btn-connect-option,a.btn.badge-load-more-post,a.btn-share.facebook,a.btn-share.twitter,a.btn-connect-option.facebook,a.btn-connect-option.google-plus,a.cmnt-btn.size-30.submit-comment.badge-post-trigger,ul.primary a.selected,a.cmnt-btn.link.grey.size-30.submit-reaction,a.btn-primary.badge-signup-button,span.badge-toast-message,div.blank-state.upvote h3,div.blank-state.upload h3,div.blank-state.overview h3,div.blank-state.comment h3{color:#f7f7f7!important}a.badge-more-share-button.more,a.badge-item-vote-down.down,a.badge-item-vote-up.up,a.badge-item-vote-up.up span,a.comment.badge-evt.badge-item-comment,a.badge-scroll-to-top.back-to-top,.section-nav,span.badge-toast-message,div.toast.badge-toast-container.toast-color-yellow p.close,a.badge-evt.post-read-more{background-color:#1e1e1e!important;border-color:#606060!important}div.title h3,ul li.selected p span.cell-title{color:#b4b4b4!important}span.toggle.badge-personalise-options span.off{background-color:#d91f1f!important}.section-header .navigation .title{border-color:#606060!important}.section-header .navigation .section-nav{border-color:#606060!important}.flex.menu,.function-wrap,div.popup-menu ul,div.popup-menu ul li a,div.nav-wrap{background-color:#2c2c2c!important;border-color:#606060}.user-function,.visitor-function{padding-bottom:8px}div.nav-wrap div.headbar-items ul li a.selected span{color:#63a2ca!important;border-bottom:4px solid #63a2ca!important}a.badge-logout-btn{color:#d76868!important}input.ui-autocomplete-input.search.search_input,ul.search-suggestion{background-color:#656565!important;color:#b4b4b4!important}header#top-nav a:hover{color:#efefef!important}header#top-nav a.upload,a.btn-primary.badge-signup-button{background-color:#63a2ca!important;color:#fff!important}header#top-nav a.upload:hover,a.btn-primary.badge-signup-button:hover{background-color:#71b5e0!important}.section-nav a{color:#d9d9d9!important}.section-nav a:hover{color:#999!important}.section-control h3,header div.title h3{color:#000!important}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{color:#c6c6c6!important}div.post-text-container.badge-item-description h3{color:#ddd!important}label{color:#999!important}a{color:#999!important;-webkit-transition:all .4s ease!important;-moz-transition:all .4s ease!important;-o-transition:all .4s ease!important;transition:all .4s ease!important}a:hover{color:#646464!important}a.badge-evt.post-read-more{color:#5a5a5a!important}div.post-container div.nsfw-post h3{color:#ad6c8f!important}div.post-container div.nsfw-post p{color:#854b78!important}div.main-wrap div.loading a.btn.badge-load-more-post.spin{background:#1e1e1e;width:30px;height:30px;margin:100px auto;-webkit-animation:rotateplane 1.2s infinite ease-in-out;animation:rotateplane 1.2s infinite ease-in-out;border-color:#606060!important}section.block-feature-cover div.loading a.btn.spin{background:#1e1e1e;width:30px;height:30px;margin:30px auto;-webkit-animation:rotateplane 1.2s infinite ease-in-out;animation:rotateplane 1.2s infinite ease-in-out;border-color:#606060!important}div.spinner-here.badge-loading-indicator{background:#1e1e1e;width:30px;height:30px;margin:100px auto;border:2px solid #606060;-webkit-animation:rotateplane 1.2s infinite ease-in-out;animation:rotateplane 1.2s infinite ease-in-out}.post-afterbar-meta,.CS3 .tab-bar,.CS3 input[type="url"],.CS3 textarea,.CS3 .comment-box .action{border-color:#606060}div.in-post-top span.label{background-color:#ff3c1f!important}div.in-post-top span.label:hover{background-color:#ff6852!important}section.post-comment a.cmnt-btn{color:#000!important}div.notice-message p{color:#c6c6c6!important}div.main-wrap h3,div.field p.label,div.header h3,div.content label,div.checklist label{color:#000!important}div.badge-gag-ads-container.image-container{background-color:#222!important}a.thick.badge-social-unbind,a.thick.badge-add-fb-timeline,a#jsid-delete-account-btn{color:#ff3c1f!important}a.thick.badge-social-unbind:hover,a.thick.badge-add-fb-timeline:hover,a#jsid-delete-account-btn:hover{color:#ff6852!important}section.notification-detail h3,div.tab-bar-left h3,div.info h3{color:#ededed!important}div.notification-text-list{color:#d9d9d9!important}div.static-block a{color:#0087f7!important}div.static-block a:hover{color:#0674cf!important}div#captchadiv,div.file-field{background:#565656!important}a.badge-evt.post-read-more{color:#b4b4b4!important}a.badge-evt.post-read-more:hover{color:#f7f7f7!important}a.badge-evt.post-read-more span.shadow{display:none!important}a.post-read-more{border-top:1px solid #fff}.headbar-search{background-color:#2c2c2c;color:#dcdcdc;border-color:#606060}.headbar-search input[type="text"]{background-color:#2c2c2c;color:#dcdcdc}.badge-entry-container{border-color:#606060!important}.headbar-search-suggest ul a strong{color:#dcdcdc}.notification-menu{background-color:#2c2c2c;border-color:#606060!important}.notification-menu .title h3{;color:#dcdcdc!important}.notification-menu .title{;border-color:#606060!important}.notification-menu .bumper{background-color:#2c2c2c;border-color:#606060!important}.notification-menu .bumper:hover{background-color:#3c3c3c}.notification-menu li.empty:hover{background-color:#3c3c3c}.user-function .btn-primary,.visitor-function .btn-primary{color:#fff!important}div.navigation div.title{border-top:1px solid #606060!important}div.navigation div.section-nav{border-bottom:1px solid #606060!important}div.meta p{color:#b4b4b4!important}span.username{color:#b4b4b4!important}p#jsid-description{color:#fff!important}.CS3 span.drop{background-color:#b4b4b4;border:1px solid #606060!important}.post-afterbar-a .others a.more{border:1px solid #606060!important}.CS3 .comment-pop-menu ul{background-color:#2c2c2c;border:1px solid #606060}.CS3 .comment-pop-menu a{color:#dcdcdc;background-color:#2c2c2c}.CS3 .comment-pop-menu a:hover{color:#dcdcdc!important;background-color:#353535}section.modal.upload .source-file{background-color:#1e1e1e;color:#8c8c8c;border-color:#606060!important}section.modal.upload .source-file:hover{background-color:#2c2c2c;color:#8c8c8c!important}section.modal.upload .source-meme,section.modal.upload .source-url{background-color:#1e1e1e;color:#8c8c8c;border-color:#606060!important}section.modal.upload .source-meme:hover,section.modal.upload .source-url:hover{background-color:#2c2c2c;color:#8c8c8c!important}section.modal a.btn-close{background-color:#b4b4b4;border:1px solid #ccc!important}section.modal{border:1px solid #606060!important;color:#8c8c8c}.theme-2 .hero{color:#dcdcdc;background-color:#090909}form#login-email div.btn-container,section#signup div.btn-container{border:none!important}section#signup .social-signup{border-bottom:1px solid #606060}::selection{background-color:#fff360!important;color:#fff!important;text-shadow:1px 0 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.45)!important}::-moz-selection{background-color:#fff360!important;color:#fff!important;text-shadow:1px 0 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.45)!important}::-webkit-selection{background-color:#fff360!important;color:#fff!important;text-shadow:1px 0 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.45)!important}@-webkit-keyframes rotateplane{0%{-webkit-transform:perspective(120px)}50%{-webkit-transform:perspective(120px) rotateY(180deg)}100%{-webkit-transform:perspective(120px) rotateY(180deg) rotateX(180deg)}}@keyframes rotateplane{0%{transform:perspective(120px) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg);-webkit-transform:perspective(120px) rotateX(0deg) rotateY(0deg)}50%{transform:perspective(120px) rotateX(-180.1deg) rotateY(0deg);-webkit-transform:perspective(120px) rotateX(-180.1deg) rotateY(0deg)}100%{transform:perspective(120px) rotateX(-180deg) rotateY(-179.9deg);-webkit-transform:perspective(120px) rotateX(-180deg) rotateY(-179.9deg)}}.gif-post span.play{border:5px solid #606060}}
